languages.text: {n}Наставления ткача упали на благодатную почву. Паства малых сект сплотилась и принялась громить места, где собирались их святые гонители. Страх заставил священников прекратить репрессии. Вскоре среди малых культов стали расти новые учения, схожие в философии с Кровавой паутиной.{/n}

{n}The spinner's instructions fell on fertile ground. The congregations of the sects rallied and began to smash the gathering places of their saintly persecutors. Fear forced the priests to cease repressions, and before long, new doctrines similar in philosophy to the Bloodspun Web began to grow among the minor cults.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Наставления ткача упали на благодатную почву. Паства малых сект сплотилась и принялась громить места, где собирались их святые гонители. Страх заставил священников прекратить репрессии. Вскоре среди малых культов стали расти новые учения, схожие в философии с Кровавой паутиной.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The weaver's instructions fell on fertile ground. The flock of the small sects rallied and began to smash the gathering places of their saintly persecutors. Fear forced the priests to cease repressions, and before long, new doctrines similar in philosophy to the Bloodspun Web began to grow among the minor cults.{/n}

Fear forced the priests to cease repressions, and before long, new doctrines similar in philosophy to the Bloodspun Web began to grow among the minor cults.{/n}

Fear forced the priests to cease repressions, and before long, new doctrines similar in philosophy to the Bloodspun Web began to grow among the minor cults.{/n}

Fear forced the priests to cease repressions, and before long, new doctrines similar in philosophy to the Bloodspun Web began to grow among the minor cults.{/n}

Fear forced the priests to cease repressions, and before long, new doctrines similar in philosophy to the Bloodspun Web began to grow among the minor cults.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Anweisungen der Spinner sind auf fruchtbaren Boden gestoßen. Die Gemeinden der Sekten haben sich gesammelt und angefangen, die Versammlungsorte ihrer frommen Verfolger zu zerstören. Furcht zwang die Priester, die Unterdrückung zu beenden, und wenig später entstanden unter den niederen Kulten Doktrinen, die der Philosophie des Blutgesponnenen Netzes ähnelten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The spinner's instructions fell on fertile ground. The congregations of the sects rallied and began to smash the gathering places of their saintly persecutors. Fear forced the priests to cease repressions, and before long, new doctrines similar in philosophy to the Bloodspun Web began to grow among the minor cults.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Anweisungen der Spinner sind auf fruchtbaren Boden gestoßen. Die Gemeinden der Sekten haben sich gesammelt und angefangen, die Versammlungsorte ihrer frommen Verfolger zu zerstören. Furcht zwang die Priester, die Unterdrückung zu beenden, und wenig später entstanden unter den niederen Kulten Doktrinen, die der Philosophie des Blutgesponnenen Netzes ähnelten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les instructions du tisseur ne sont pas restées lettre morte. Les groupuscules sectaires ont uni leurs forces avant de démanteler les lieux de rassemblement de leurs persécuteurs consacrés. La peur a obligé les prêtres à mettre un terme à leur politique répressive, et de nouvelles doctrines similaires à la philosophie de la Toile de Sang n'ont pas tardé à prendre racine parmi les cultes mineurs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The spinner's instructions fell on fertile ground. The congregations of the sects rallied and began to smash the gathering places of their saintly persecutors. Fear forced the priests to cease repressions, and before long, new doctrines similar in philosophy to the Bloodspun Web began to grow among the minor cults.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les instructions du tisseur ne sont pas restées lettre morte. Les groupuscules sectaires ont uni leurs forces avant de démanteler les lieux de rassemblement de leurs persécuteurs consacrés. La peur a obligé les prêtres à mettre un terme à leur politique répressive, et de nouvelles doctrines similaires à la philosophie de la Toile de Sang n'ont pas tardé à prendre racine parmi les cultes mineurs.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las instrucciones del tejedor dieron sus frutos. Las congregaciones de las sectas se reagruparon y empezaron a asaltar los lugares de reunión de sus santurrones perseguidores. El miedo detuvo la represión de los sacerdotes y, al poco tiempo, nuevas doctrinas con filosofías similares a la de la Red Sanguinolenta empezaron a propagarse entre los cultos menores.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The spinner's instructions fell on fertile ground. The congregations of the sects rallied and began to smash the gathering places of their saintly persecutors. Fear forced the priests to cease repressions, and before long, new doctrines similar in philosophy to the Bloodspun Web began to grow among the minor cults.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las instrucciones del tejedor dieron sus frutos. Las congregaciones de las sectas se reagruparon y empezaron a asaltar los lugares de reunión de sus santurrones perseguidores. El miedo detuvo la represión de los sacerdotes y, al poco tiempo, nuevas doctrinas con filosofías similares a la de la Red Sanguinolenta empezaron a propagarse entre los cultos menores.{/n}

languages.text: {n}スピナーの指示は肥沃な大地に落ちた。宗派の信徒たちは結集し、精神迫害者どもの集会所を破壊し始めた。恐怖心から司祭者たちは弾圧を止めざるを得なくなり、ほどなくして小規模なカルトの間でブラッドスパン・ウェブに似た思想の新たな教義が広まり始めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The spinner's instructions fell on fertile ground. The congregations of the sects rallied and began to smash the gathering places of their saintly persecutors. Fear forced the priests to cease repressions, and before long, new doctrines similar in philosophy to the Bloodspun Web began to grow among the minor cults.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}スピナーの指示は肥沃な大地に落ちた。宗派の信徒たちは結集し、精神迫害者どもの集会所を破壊し始めた。恐怖心から司祭者たちは弾圧を止めざるを得なくなり、ほどなくして小規模なカルトの間でブラッドスパン・ウェブに似た思想の新たな教義が広まり始めた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}织网者的教诲在这片肥沃的土地上生根发芽。那些遭到迫害的教众自发聚集起来，开始捣毁那些道貌岸然的迫害者的聚点。出于恐惧，神父们不敢继续镇压那些小型教派。不久之后，新的教义在小型教派之中开始盛行，与织血罗网的教义非常相像。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The spinner's instructions fell on fertile ground. The congregations of the sects rallied and began to smash the gathering places of their saintly persecutors. Fear forced the priests to cease repressions, and before long, new doctrines similar in philosophy to the Bloodspun Web began to grow among the minor cults.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}织网者的教诲在这片肥沃的土地上生根发芽。那些遭到迫害的教众自发聚集起来，开始捣毁那些道貌岸然的迫害者的聚点。出于恐惧，神父们不敢继续镇压那些小型教派。不久之后，新的教义在小型教派之中开始盛行，与织血罗网的教义非常相像。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dokurun talimatları dikkate alındı. Hizipler, cemaatlerini toplayıp onlara eziyet çektiren azizlerin toplandığı noktaları yerle bir etmeye başladı. Korku, rahipleri baskıya son vermeye zorladı ve çok geçmeden küçük tarikatlar arasında felsefeli Kanipi Ağı'nınkine benzeyen yeni öğretiler filizlenmeye başladı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The spinner's instructions fell on fertile ground. The congregations of the sects rallied and began to smash the gathering places of their saintly persecutors. Fear forced the priests to cease repressions, and before long, new doctrines similar in philosophy to the Bloodspun Web began to grow among the minor cults.{/n}
